articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Measles is “growing global threat,” CDC tells doctors in alert message - Ars Technica
articles.description: Since December, there have been 23 measles cases in the US, including two outbreaks.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ A baby with measles. 
51
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is putting clinicians on alert about the growing risk of measles cases and outbreaks amid a global surge in transmis… [+3608 chars]
